data.taskTitle: failed to create task for newly created project sdart
failed to create task for newly created project sdart
data.approach: Fix TaskCreationDrawer to pass project parameter to spawn API when clicking Save & Start. The drawer knows formData.project but only sends taskId to spawn. This causes spawn to fall back to jat project when the task prefix is not in JAT config.

data.taskTitle: failed to create task for newly created project sdart
summary: Identified root cause: TaskCreationDrawer only sent taskId to spawn API, not the project name
Fixed by adding project parameter to spawn request body
The spawn API already supports project parameter, just was not being passed
reviewFocus: Verify the fix works for newly created projects

data.taskTitle: failed to create task for newly created project sdart
summary: Fixed TaskCreationDrawer to pass project parameter to spawn API
Added initializeBeads() helper to projects API that runs git init and bd init
Modified POST /api/projects action=create to initialize beads before adding to config
Now any method of adding a project (CreateProjectDrawer or ProjectEditor) properly initializes beads

summary: Fixed TaskCreationDrawer to pass project parameter to spawn API request
Added initializeBeads() helper function to projects API that runs git init and bd init
Modified POST /api/projects action=create to initialize beads before adding to config
Now any method of adding a project (CreateProjectDrawer or ProjectEditor) properly initializes beads

gotchas: POST /api/projects has two different flows - action=create adds project, /api/projects/init does full initialization
